name: RemoveMerchantCustomAttribute
description:
Deletes a custom attribute from a merchant.

Use this tool to delete a custom attribute associated with a merchant. The attribute can only be deleted if its visibility is set to 'VISIBILITY_READ_WRITE_VALUES' if owned by another application.

parameters.name: merchant_identifier
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the target merchant whose custom attribute will be deleted.

parameters.name: custom_attribute_key
parameters.description: The key of the custom attribute to delete. It must match a custom attribute definition in the Square seller account. Use a qualified key if not the definition owner.

value_schema.description:
The key of the custom attribute to delete. This key must match the `key` of a custom
attribute definition in the Square seller account. If the requesting application is not the
definition owner, you must use the qualified key.

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the squareup API.

parameters.name: key
parameters.description:
The key of the custom attribute to delete. This key must match the `key` of a custom
attribute definition in the Square seller account. If the requesting application is not the
definition owner, you must use the qualified key.

value_schema.description:
The key of the custom attribute to delete. This key must match the `key` of a custom
attribute definition in the Square seller account. If the requesting application is not the
definition owner, you must use the qualified key.

secrets.description: The OAuth token to use for authentication.
